from itertools import combinations
{% endraw %}

part 1

{% raw %} 
def read(f):
    return [int(x) for x in open(f, 'r')]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
xs_test = read("./data/09_test.txt")
xs_test

[35,
 20,

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def p1(xs, len_preamble):
    for i in range(len_preamble, len(xs)):
        preamble = xs[i - len_preamble:i]
        sums = [x1 + x2 for (x1, x2) in combinations(preamble, 2)]
        if xs[i] not in sums:
            return xs[i]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert p1(xs_test, 5) == 127
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
xs = read("./data/09.txt")
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
p1(xs, 25)

258585477
{% endraw %}

part 2

{% raw %}

window[source]

window(iterable, size=1)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def p2(xs, bingo):
    for window_size in range(2, len(xs)):
        for x in window(xs, window_size):
            if sum(x) == bingo:
                return min(x) + max(x)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert p2(xs_test, 127) == 62
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
p2(xs, p1(xs, 25))

36981213
{% endraw %}
